com.easemob.chat

类 EaseMobChat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easemob.chat.EaseMobChat

  • public class EaseMobChat
extends java.lang.Object
    环信SDK入口，需要在应用的application 类里初始化 
         EaseMobChat.getInstance().init(application_context);
    版本:
    2.0
